website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable shirt that provides good sun protection, but don't believe its cooling claims.
pros: Breathable fabric helps keep you cool
cons: Shirt's cooling features don't live up to the advertised claims

customer_reviews.title: Not cooler than the others.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband that works outdoors. The day before he got the shirt he worked outside in 100 degree weathwr, He theb wore the shirt the next day in very similar heat, he said it didn't provide him any extra relief or cooling from the heat. Had it worked we would buy more, not worth it, false advertising in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine Arctic Cool-from China
customer_reviews.text: This is not a genuine Arctic Cool shirt. It came from China. It has no label saying Arctic Cool. It is 100% cotton and very heavy. Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shirt but actually warmer than a cotton shirt until you sweat. Not worth the extra $
customer_reviews.author: Vinni H.

customer_reviews.title: I've used evaporative vests in the past and unless you have some air flow and low humidity this shirt will just feel like a wet shirt
customer_reviews.text: How they advertise this product is misleading especially on other sites. How these shirts work is by evaporative cooling that is you have to be wet for this to work. They forget to mention that in their description of the product. I've used evaporative vests in the past and unless you have some air flow and low humidity this shirt will just feel like a wet shirt. It is made well but way over priced for a wicking shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hedgspeth

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirts that do what they say for me. I work outside in Fl but under a shed with a big fan so not in the direct sun but even then some days the heat index where I work will get well over 100 and these shirts keep me feeling very cool...I was really amazed...I think the problem with them though would be they require a breeze and we never get much of a breeze where I work so if I was working out side away from the fan like a lot of my co-workers I don't think they would help a lot.I guess they would be situational depending on where you work.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a M.  Bigger than most XL tees.  Also see through.
customer_reviews.text: The cut on the medium is huge! Really astounded how large it is. More of a mumu or pregnancy cut. I have an older Arctic Cool tee, the cut of which is more athletic (tapered) and the overall dimensions consistent with what I expect of a medium shirt, unfortunately the company does not offer these anymore. I would return it except the costs to return are approaching half of what I paid for the tee. I will end up gifting it to one of my larger framed extended family. The fabric is amazingly thin, lightweight and see-through (ordered the white). While lightweight is fine, the see-through means I would not want to be wearing this as a gym tee.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Not cooler than any other shirt.
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is no cooler than any other shirt. Just more expensive. When I contacted them, they suggested I get it wet to activate the cooling. I’m not wearing a wet shirt! I can wear a wet shirt with any $5 shirt, the point is I don’t want to wear my clothes wet!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bf who works in a kitchen with no climate control. Temps can easily reach 120+ degrees on a summer day. Was a little skeptical but took a chance and he loves it! So much that we're ordering a couple more for him. You can pre-moisten the shirts for instant cooling, or just put it on and go about your business, letting your sweat start the cooling effect. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Just a regular shirt
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this shirt. I got it for a vacation to Italy, and if anything it made me feel hotter and gross. Water was pretty readily available, and it was 98 degrees, so plenty of sweat too. The shirt felt humid, and clingy. I tried "flapping" it to cool it, but it just felt like any wet shirt, nothing unusually cool. I mean as a regular sport-fabric shirt it's fine. It was packaged nicely and is well made. But I didn't experience anything unique as far as cooling goes. I took a cooling neck towel which ended up being the real MVP.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: I tried two applications
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry tonsay that this shirt did not meet my expectations. I live in Texas heat and hoped it would help. I tried it as an undershirt first, and was just more hot. I tried wearing it mowing the lawn and it seemed like any otjer sweaty t-shirt. I hate being disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Does not cool. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does not have any cooling action at all. Just a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: tabber1

customer_reviews.title: Works wicking sweat!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby wears this under his work tshirt. He doesn't get the cooling effect because air wont reach it BUT he loves it and made me order more. He said: It soaks up all the sweat and doesnt come thru to his work shirt. He isnt sweating as much. Keeps him not as hot as he would be normally. Did not smell when he took it off. When he came home we were outside and he took off both shirts and he was hotter without it on. Btw..we live in texas where its 100 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Betty K

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Comfortable, Sizes are a little large
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 2 Artic Ts. They are much cooler than cotton. Sizing is on the large side. Usually I wear a men’s medium, but the small Artic T is more comfortable. I may buy another one or two so I can be more comfortable this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Blue

customer_reviews.title: So far actually does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical about the claims made about this shirt. I sweat pretty heavily in high humidity. Today, it’s almost 90 degrees with between 75-85% humidity. I am doing some pretty labor intensive work outside ripping up compacted soil, doing some chainsaw work on a large downed tree. Generally in this weather I would have probably already changed my shirt. I am clearly sweating like normal and it’s visible from the outside of the shirt. However I can’t feel it all as far as moisture or weight on the shirt. So far it’s exceeding my expectations. Hopefully I’ll be able to afford and try out a few more of these in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Duddy

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fits well and looks well, but all the hype about "instant cooling" is just that. When I wear it, I feel no more cooling than if I were wearing a cheap cotton shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: It's a shirt, nothing more
customer_reviews.text: As an athletic shirt, this is fine. Lightweight, not clingy. As for the "cooling effect" I sure haven't felt it. I've gone bike riding in Carolina heat and humdity all summer and this shirt feels exactly the same as any of my other synthetic shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Parrent

customer_reviews.title: Such a crock....
customer_reviews.text: This shirt did not do anything. Such a gimmick. Shirt was soaked within minutes after getting out in the sun and just standing there. A cotton shirt would have been better or even a number of UA shirts that I have do a better job then this one. I got it as a Father’s Day gift and it is getting sent back. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erins Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not working - dont waist your money
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida Purchase this to wear under motorcycle jacket Sweat like a dog and hotter than regular t-shirt
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is horrible. The difference between a 2XL and 3XL equals the difference between a shirt and a dress. I'm 6'5" and have 51-52" shoulders so the 2XL was a bit tight. The 3XL must be made for a 8' tall 400lb giant. It literally almost went to my knees. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Husband works outside in the elements.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shirt for my husband to wear in place of a cotton t-shirt underneath his work shirts. He says they dry out faster which keeps him cooler. I’ve noticed they maintain their clean appearance longer than cotton, resulting in longer life. My husband reaches for these shirts first no matter what the weather conditions for the day. He’s also long waisted and these shirts are long enough to stay tucked in his waistband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shirts do what they say they do!!
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are really nice. They do everything they say they do. I wear them as a t-shirt under my collared button down shirt. I’m a bigger guy. I sweat a lot. They wick the moisture away from your body. They do cool you down and dry quickly. The only thing I dislike is the price. But, you pay for what you get and I think they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: tloeffler

customer_reviews.title: Best shirt ever
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shirt. I purchased this shirt for the cooling effect that it advertises. Whenever I wear this at work or outside, I can definitely tell the difference between this shirt and another name brand moisture wicking shirt. It outperforms the other brands at cooling and controlling sweat. It feels nice to the touch and feels really lightweight, this shirt is awesome. I would definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: Spaniard

customer_reviews.title: Money Wasted
customer_reviews.text: I've had no cooling effects of any kind; a waste of $30.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Eden

customer_reviews.title: Football player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my grandson to wear under pads and uniform shirt. Shirt is really not designed to be worn under another garment. AC suggested to wet the shirt, squeeze out excess moisture and shake out before putting on under pads and uniform shirt. Cade said he couldn't tell much cooling effect during game, but once uniform shirt came off there was immediate cool down when air hit shirt. That's important in the South when it can still be over 100° heat index at game time. Thanks AC
customer_reviews.author: BamaCyn

customer_reviews.title: RIP off, doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Save your money just but the same shirt at Walmart, it doesn't do anything special
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, fits great.  Great quality.  A little pricey
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this product. He loved the color and the fact that it tapers towards the waist. His shoulders are much broader and hates the way a lot of t shirts fit so baggy. He was out in son and no sweat showed through shirt. In general he really liked the product. Our only complaint was the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Decent base layer shirt, irritating logo
customer_reviews.text: I own a couple of these and like them for a hiking base layer. Wish they would sell them sans logo: 1) The logo looks far far too much like the Star Trek emblem (to the point of having people ask me why I'm wearing a Star Trek uniform 2) The logo has worn off of every single one of the shirts I've owned withing a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: John Fedak

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to order more than one!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt. After wearing it for only 1 day he requested that I get more! Now for some this might not be a big deal. However, my husband never wants anything new. He always says he has a closet full. It looks great on and produces the cooling effect as advertised. It was way above our expectations. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hansen

customer_reviews.title: All Hype don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt since I work in a semi warm environment so I tend to sweat a little because of it but all this shirt does it make you run hot regardless. You would be better off just wearing a cotton t shirt for $5 over wearing this overpriced shirt with "moisture control" I would have returned this right away but I was hoping maybe it just needed to be broken in. Only thing broke now is trust for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This item is a bit longer than expected for fit, but otherwise fits as expected. For my friend who is ALWAYS warm and ALWAYS sweating, spent an entire day outside in the warm sun, he only sweat in his words “a little bit.” I would recommend this to anyone and will be ordering him more in more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: R.L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very little effective
customer_reviews.text: If you dont mind clingy clothes itll do. Doesnt really cool very well, offers very little relief. Very lightweight. Not really worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Bruti

customer_reviews.title: Work fine but too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, moisture wicking like it says but too expensive. Bought some moisture wicking shirts at Walmart that work just as well for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Diedrich

customer_reviews.title: Instant Cooling Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Does help cool as long as it is not worn under coveralls. I purchased for my husband who is mechanic that works in the heat. As long as it is not covered it does cool.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Law

customer_reviews.title: Actually works! This is worn under a ballistic vest ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually works! This is worn under a ballistic vest in Arizona. Tried and tested in the hot Summer and works! It doesn't feel cold to the skin, but noticeably cooler than any other shirt my husband's tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jawd

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, works well to keep cool
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, works well to keep cool. Note that this shirt also works as a "color catcher" in the washing machine, so do not wash it with ANYTHING that may bleed color. *this shirt is now a light shade of pink, but it does not cause functional changes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: really pulls the water away
customer_reviews.text: I'm not so sure on how well it "cools" you, but I am very impressed with its ability to keep you dry. I was caught in a downpour at work, soaked to the bone. fifteen minutes later my skin was dry! the outside of the shirt was still wet, but the inside was dry! 6 hours later, my denim pants were still damp, but my top was bone dry and had been for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: See photos...
customer_reviews.text: Never even made it to the washing machine. Label ruined shirt emblem and left sticky residue on shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Petrea Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear for long periods
customer_reviews.text: Working on hot sunny days that require a lot of hydration, this product took only a few hours to stand out. Sweat happens, what happens next is when you realize you do not notice the sweat, the heat to some extent, as the shirt took the moisture. The comfort factor remains even in the midst of the heat. Glad to wear the shirt. Will continue to evaluate but now consider it much like a tool for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Harold E. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shirt for working in southern heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shirt to work in when the humidity and heat outside are both nearing 100 degrees. It works pretty well with keeping sweat off you and keeping you feeling cool. I work outside so this is nice addition to work clothes.
customer_reviews.author: mendy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s an Ok shirt but no cooler than any other athletic shirt. I wanted to believe their marketing material that this was cooler but it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Not my first Arctic Cool garment
customer_reviews.text: I have several short sleeve and long sleeve Arctic Cool tee shirts and also polo shirts in a variety of colors. The polo shirts are all I wear while golfing. The tees I wear when just kicking around. I purchased these for my Son, an EMT on Oahu, Hawaii. He must wear a cotton uniform shirt. I sent him two of these. He loves them. They keep him cool, even on the hot muggier days.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you try it!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for my husband! He doesn't work outside but works in a factory where it's hotter inside than it is outside! When I came across this shirt I read mixed reviews on whether it worked or not. I really wanted it to work for him so I thought I would at least try it. He's worn it three times now and says it's remarkable!! He still gets hot, he still sweats, but it DOES keep him cooler! I just ordered another one! (Just FYI... I ordered a size smaller this time as the first one is a little loose)
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it actually is any better at keeping you cooler than any other “performance” type of t-shirt because I feel they all do about the same thing but it is very comfortable and does fit and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Slough

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend Says These Shirts Work!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had come upon these shirts online and showed me the cool technology they had... So I bought him a couple for his birthday because he is ALWAYS hot (we live in South Florida). He says they really do help! I’m sure we’ll be getting more of them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: EJyo

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He's a flatbed trucker,and he gets extremely hot. He started wearing as soon as he got it, and he absolutely raves about it and how cool he feels. I can only report on what he told me :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Lightweight Shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt. He says it's very comfortable and is lightweight. He didn't think it was shockingly cool like the ads claim, but still a very comfortable shirt and he wants more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Shirt is fine, but no cooling effects
customer_reviews.text: The shirt itself is fine but it doesn’t provide any cooling effects. Could get the same style shirt for less money than this being as though it does not deliver its selling point.
customer_reviews.author: joncolvin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool in the heat
customer_reviews.text: This shirt does seem to function as expected. It was larger than I thought it would be. I am hoping the sizes are consistent and I will be ordering a new color with one size down.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt to beat the heat
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt! We live in Florida, and it's Summer, and he always grabs this shirt when he's working outside. I'm getting him a couple more. It looks great on him too.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bixler

customer_reviews.title: Holds smell
customer_reviews.text: 5’8”. 195 lbs. Bought a large. Wasn’t able to even get a year out of wear before this shirt started holding smells no matter what detergent was used. The color is vibrant and it’s true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine354

customer_reviews.title: Great for doing yardwork
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband as a yard work shirt. He seems satisfied by it since he keeps putting it on when he does outside work here in the summer. Fits nice, is sewn nicely and is a nice color. Will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt! He said it really helps cool him down. I was skeptical, but now that he's worn it I will buy more! He works in a warehouse that gets very hot. He even wore it twice without washing which he NEVER does, because he likes it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Laurell Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, doesn't cool me down though
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit bigger than I expected. It doesn't cool me down but it does help me from not sweating like crazy. I work in a kitchen and it is even hotter in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Les Anderson jr

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Great product although there is a big difference between 3XL and 2XL. The 3X was too large, hanging on my son and the 2XL was snug enough that now he won't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: JayG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who mostly works outside as an electrician. He’s constantly sweating and this shirt helped him tremendously! He said it cooled him down when he got super sweaty and it never stuck to his chest. When he first put it on, he raced about how soft it was. Great product! Will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Kea C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Worn under police uniform- more comfortable than cotton tshirt. Wicks away moisture very well.
customer_reviews.author: Elvee

customer_reviews.title: Great to wear under mandatory uniforms
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shirt as a gift for my son in law for his birthday. He is an EMT in a low desert community and often responds to calls in the dead of heat. He wears this top underneath a button up polyester work uniform top and said this top is definetly cooling, comfortable, and moves with him. He also said it doesnt add bulk to his uniform. All in all, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as he gets so hot working in the FL sun. He was very impressed with the shirt and said, "it works!" Couldn't be any happier.
customer_reviews.author: Pashb

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really terrific Performance Shirt. Great quality, doesn't accumulate sweat and the wicking keeps you cool and smell free. Would definitely buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ron

customer_reviews.title: Just a shirt
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel any of the advertised cooling effects, wore on a hot day, sweating quite a bit, did not feel any different from shirts 1/3rd the price. Nice shirt, but not a thirty dollar shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Your satisfaction depends on which model/match you get.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got fits and feels great. The 2nd one is made of a different material - it's more form-fitting/stretchy and not as cooling.
customer_reviews.author: roccof13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shirt for the heat
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is well worth it It keeps the core body cool and in Missouri it’s been extremely hot with heat index in the 110’s and it has helped tremendously. It fits perfect and just a great product overall
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for our vacation to coastal area in hot August. He loves it! It’s lightweight, comfortable, looks and fits good...and is cooling. He wants more of these.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Too many loose threads from the hem had to be cut off before it all came undone. I would expect better quality control for this price. I'll look elsewhere first for this type of clothing
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and doesn’t really do anything.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get the hype. This is basically an expensive dry fit shirt. I ordered a 2xl and it is probably 2 sizes smaller, large or a smallish xl.
customer_reviews.author: Nobleone

customer_reviews.title: Shirt tail is WAY to short.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was the absolute worst part of the shirt. Chest and shoulder's were fine. However the length was so short that if I barely bent over 1" - 2 inches above my belt was exposed. No way this shirt would have stayed tucked in. I am 6" 245lbs athletic build.
customer_reviews.author: Don Grable

customer_reviews.title: Fine Looking Shirt// Does Not Exceed Capabilities of Other Exercise Wear
customer_reviews.text: This is a handsome shirt, and functions as most outdoor/exercise products do in high humidity environments. I do not see that it has any cooling properties exceeding other shirts meant for exercise/outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than wearing a t-shirt when riding
customer_reviews.text: Combined with my Joe Rocket mesh jacket, this shirt kept me more comfortable than I would have been wearing a regular t-shirt when riding my motorcycle. It does tend to fit a bit snug, but I think that is part of the magic of how it wicks the sweat away.
customer_reviews.author: Your Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and low maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific shirts. Very comfortable and they look great right out of the dryer or in a pinch if you have to wring it out in a towel and let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt, no miracle tech
customer_reviews.text: A very nice shirt, hangs well on the body and comfortable, and the price is reasonable. Any cooler that other performance shirts? Not in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: W. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a second t-shirt
customer_reviews.text: It is better than any cotton shirt for hot sweaty workouts. I really do feel cooler in it when I am outside and working up a sweat. I ordered a second shirt in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great and not over priced.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really comfortable and light weight,it’s perfect for when I’m at the gym. It pretty much repels my sweat and Keri’s me cool. But it’s also a nice shirt to wear out semi dressed up. Going to pick up a few more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cooler and dryer than other shirts
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these shirts. He says they are noticeably cooler and dryer than any other shirts he’s had, and he’s searched a long time for a shirt this comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Hall

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my restaurant kitchen staff. They raved about them. They told me that they’d wear these shirts all the time, every day! They said the shirts were unbelievably cool in the hot (100+ degrees) kitchen. I will buy these again. Make sure you buy authentic Arctic Cool !
customer_reviews.author: positive force

customer_reviews.title: Ability to cool you down from the heat of summer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shirts for my 3 grandsons in their 20s. All 3 work outdoors. The oldest one told me it really cooled him off. Never heard even a thank you from the other 2. That's expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and feel for anything in life
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves that he can wear these shirts around the house or on the golf course. Great fit and feel to skin.
customer_reviews.author: cynharm

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for boyfriend who hates summer and the heat. He said it keep him cool and that is really saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Go up one size
customer_reviews.text: I think the sizes run small, at least one size. Fortunately I have son in laws to gift this shirt too.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Boda

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable to wear on a very hot day!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out on a very hot day. Spritzing really helps bring on the cooling effect and the smooth material is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a tee shirt for work but do wear them on weekends. Like the soft feel of the material. They are a little pricy, but no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Drew

customer_reviews.title: Too Long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 3X and it fits well in the shoulders however it is so long it must be buit for a man that is 7 feet tall. I am only 5' 6" and the shirt goes down to my knees. I am not sure how they size these but it is sized differently.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool at work with no AC.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shirts dont love the price. Have 6 i wear at work. Only complaint is the new design seem to be a tad smaller.
customer_reviews.author: KenMal78

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and work as described.
customer_reviews.text: We go to many car shows and it's always hot and humid. My wife an I now wear the Arctic Cool T's and they work great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Very small for xxl. Heavier material than expected making the shirt hot to wear
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: very light and disperses water fast
customer_reviews.text: didn't get as cool as I thought it would. have to be really wet to get effect
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Artic Shirts are the REAL deal!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased seven of these shirts this year. Once you get sweating, these shirts cool down and you cool down as a result. Better than anyother brand. I've tried them all. Excellent cooldown. Excellent wear. Easy cleaning. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RIswampfox

customer_reviews.title: Glad we ordered this
customer_reviews.text: Shirt came in as ordered and on time. Husband loves it and will definitely get much wear and use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: An ardent Austen Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cool Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The Arctic Cool men's t-shirt is comfortable and feels so because it breathes.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Love the shirt.
customer_reviews.text: My husband work outside a lot and really likes these shirts that cool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard KOELSCH

customer_reviews.title: jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: didn't seem to feel cooler until I took it off - will keep trying -- the real test will be while wearing it at WDW this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much. Living in Arizona it helps keep cool. Cooler could be substantial. Neck Tends to droop after a few washings.
customer_reviews.author: rodney wolber

customer_reviews.title: Stay Cooler with this Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the Cooling Tee for a week, playing golf in 100+ temps. It does work as promoted. Keeping it damp with a wet towel or spritzing helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very cool, even in the daytime summer heat of coastal South Carolina
customer_reviews.text: These shirts fit well and work as advertised, wicking moisture and drying quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B. Barbo

customer_reviews.title: Look good staying cool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different colors. This one we loved. The khaki is more a greenish khaki. Now to test the cooling. If it works anything like the Rtic Tumblers it will be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S - Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shirts!!
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are a game changer for sure. I’ve now purchased more shirts, shirts and underwear, hat and cooling towel for the hubby. Can’t wait to receive them. They really do help keep you cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Derusha

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Shirts
customer_reviews.text: My son said these t-shirts keep him cooler than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real cool shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Keeps the body cool. My husband loves it. Now that I know it really works, I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHIRT
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who works outside. He says the shirt works well. It is comfortable and keeps him cool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Will Purchase Again!
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband are bicyclists and they loves these shirts. Very comfortable and cool on our hot and humid days.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E

customer_reviews.title: Clingy
customer_reviews.text: Fits very close to the body, not great for a heavier guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Arctic Cool Men’s Crew Neck Instant Cooling Moisture Wicking Performance UPF 50+ Short Sleeve Workout Shirt
feature_bullets: ✔ MORE THAN MOISTURE WICKING - As you begin to sweat, the advanced HydroFreeze X fabric wicks moisture away from your skin while also dispersing it throughout. It's lightweight, breathable and quick drying. When combined with airflow, Arctic Cool's EXCLUSIVE HydroFreeze X Fabric design acts as a radiator and INSTANTLY COOLS your body through controlled evaporation...NATURALLY. Chemical-free cooling that won't wash out. Now you can do what you love...more easily, longer and comfortably!

✔ LIGHTWEIGHT BREATHABLE AND COMFORTABLE - Made with an athletic cut 4-way stretch polyester and spandex fabric blend, the Arctic Cool Men’s Crew Neck Instant Cooling Short Sleeve Shirt provides a greater range of motion for any activity. For a looser fit choose a size up! Now you can keep cool AND stay active!

✔ PERFECT FOR ANY ACTIVITY - With Arctic Cool Moisture Wicking Instant Cooling Athletic Shirts for men you can be your best and most comfortable for running, exercise, golf, yoga, fishing, hiking, camping, gardening, walking, biking, beach, boating and anytime you need maximum comfort and cooling. It even works great as a moisture wicking undershirt!

✔ SUN PROTECTION IS STANDARD - With moisture wicking and instant cooling apparel that is rated with UPF 50+ Sun Protection by an independent testing laboratory, wear your shirt doing the activities you love while being protected from the sun's harmful rays! Perfect for exercise, running, golf, yoga, fishing, hiking, camping, gardening, walking, beach, biking, and anywhere else you need maximum protection!

✔ ACTIVELY COOLS - Wear your shirt with confidence knowing that Arctic Cool's HydroFreeze X Fabric keeps you comfortable. By utilizing a controlled evaporation process, your Arctic Cool Instant Cooling Crew Neck Shirt remains cool and dries fast. Easily keep fresh and cool while being your most comfortable!
